alert.note: Alert for Monroe (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 21 at 12:02PM CDT until further notice by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Tombigbee River near Amory For the Tombigbee River...including Fulton, Bigbee, Amory, Aberdeen L & D...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tombigbee River near Amory. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, Most lowland and farm land near the river is flooded. Equipment and livestock may need to be moved to higher ground. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 AM CDT Monday the stage was 12.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow evening and continue rising to a crest of 23.1 feet Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
